branchCategory.name: IDFA*E, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Sizes 3~75, Standard Inlet Air Temperature, for Use in Europe, Asia, and Oceania
branchCategory.description: <p>Series IDFA*E refrigerated air dryers are suitable for use in aftercooled systems with compressors up to ~100 hp (depending on dew point desired).  These durable units have simple control systems and are easily serviced.</p>
